attr.title: Spinch
attr.desc: Transcend the material realm and assume your true form as Spinch, a hyper-agile organism consumed by the quest to rescue a litter of its missing offspring, in this side-scrolling, psychedelic platformer from the mind of award-winning Canadian cartoonist, Jesse Jacobs.
attr.inst: Download the game from Steam (also available from GOG and Humble, though not tested). Copy data.win, all .ogg and .ini files to /ports/spinch/gamedata
